See also: Inventar and inventář

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From invent +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [im.bənˈta]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [iɱ.vənˈta]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [iɱ.venˈtaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

inventar (first-person singular present invento, first-person singular preterite inventí, past participle inventat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /e/

  1. (transitive) to invent

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of inventar (first conjugation)
infinitive inventar
gerund inventant
past participle masculine feminine
singular inventat inventada
plural inventats inventades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present invento inventes inventa inventem inventeu inventen
imperfect inventava inventaves inventava inventàvem inventàveu inventaven
future inventaré inventaràs inventarà inventarem inventareu inventaran
preterite inventí inventares inventà inventàrem inventàreu inventaren
conditional inventaria inventaries inventaria inventaríem inventaríeu inventarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present inventi inventis inventi inventem inventeu inventin
imperfect inventés inventessis inventés inventéssim inventéssiu inventessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — inventa inventi inventem inventeu inventin
negative (no) — no inventis no inventi no inventem no inventeu no inventin

Related terms

[edit]
  • invenció
  • inventiu
  • inventor

Further reading

[edit]
  • “inventar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “inventar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “inventar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “inventar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

(This etymology is missing or incomplete. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /imbenˈtaɾ/ [im.ben̪ˈt̪aɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Hyphenation: in‧ven‧tar

Verb

[edit]

inventar (first-person singular present invento, first-person singular preterite inventei, past participle inventado)

  1. (transitive) to invent (create or find a new thing or a new way of doing it)
  2. (transitive) to invent (create with imagination a tale, story etc)
  3. (transitive) to invent (present as true something that is not)

Conjugation

[edit]

[edit]

[edit]

inventar

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From invento, from Latin inventum, the supine form of inveniō (“find, discover”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta(ʁ)/ [ĩ.vẽˈta(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta(ʁ)/ [ĩ.vẽˈta(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta(ʁ)/ [ĩ.vẽˈta(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈtaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈtaɾ/
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.bẽˈtaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ĩ.vẽˈta.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: in‧ven‧tar

Verb

[edit]

inventar (first-person singular present invento, first-person singular preterite inventei, past participle inventado)

  1. to invent, devise
  2. to imagine

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of inventar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal inventar
Personal inventar inventares inventar inventarmos inventardes inventarem
Gerund
inventando
Past participle
Masculine inventado inventados
Feminine inventada inventadas
Indicative
Present invento inventas inventa inventamos inventais inventam
Imperfect inventava inventavas inventava inventávamos inventáveis inventavam
Preterite inventei inventaste inventou inventamos1, inventámos2 inventastes inventaram
Pluperfect inventara inventaras inventara inventáramos inventáreis inventaram
Future inventarei inventarás inventará inventaremos inventareis inventarão
Conditional inventaria inventarias inventaria inventaríamos inventaríeis inventariam
Subjunctive
Present invente inventes invente inventemos inventeis inventem
Imperfect inventasse inventasses inventasse inventássemos inventásseis inventassem
Future inventar inventares inventar inventarmos inventardes inventarem
Imperative
Affirmative inventa invente inventemos inventai inventem
Negative (não) não inventes não invente não inventemos não inventeis não inventem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Quotations

[edit]

For quotations using this term, see Citations:inventar.

Related terms

[edit]
  • invenção
  • inventor

Further reading

[edit]
  • “inventar” in Dicionário Aberto based on Novo Diccionário da Língua Portuguesa de Cândido de Figueiredo, 1913
  • “inventar”, in Michaelis Dicionário Brasileiro da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), São Paulo: Editora Melhoramentos, 2015–2025
  • “inventar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Romanian

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from French inventaire.

Noun

[edit]

inventar n (plural inventare)

  1. inventory

Declension

[edit]
singular plural
indefinite definite indefinite definite
nominative-accusative inventar inventarul inventare inventarele
genitive-dative inventar inventarului inventare inventarelor
vocative inventarule inventarelor

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From invento (“invention”), from Latin inventum, the supine form of inveniō (“find, discover”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /imbenˈtaɾ/ [ĩm.bẽn̪ˈt̪aɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: in‧ven‧tar

Verb

[edit]

inventar (first-person singular present invento, first-person singular preterite inventé, past participle inventado)

  1. to invent
  2. to feign

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of inventar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive inventar
gerund inventando
past participle masculine feminine
singular inventado inventada
plural inventados inventadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes

inventásvos 		inventa inventamos inventáis inventan
imperfect inventaba inventabas inventaba inventábamos inventabais inventaban

conditional inventaría inventarías inventaría inventaríamos inventaríais inventarían

inventávos 		invente inventemos inventad inventen
negative no inventes no invente no inventemos no inventéis no inventen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of inventar

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

accusative invéntenme not used invéntenlo, invéntenla invéntennos not used invéntenlos, invéntenlas, invéntense

Derived terms

[edit]
  • no haber inventado la pólvora
  • reinventar

Related terms

[edit]
  • invención
  • inventivo
  • invento
  • inventor

Further reading

[edit]
  • “inventar”, in Diccionario de la lengua española [Dictionary of the Spanish Language] (in Spanish), online version 23.8, Royal Spanish Academy [Spanish: Real Academia Española], 10 December 2024

Venetan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From invento, from Latin inventum, the supine form of inveniō (“find, discover”). Compare Italian inventare.

Verb

[edit]

inventar

  1. (transitive) to invent
  2. (transitive) to fabricate

Conjugation

[edit]

* Venetan conjugation varies from one region to another. Hence, the following conjugation should be considered as typical, not as exhaustive.

Conjugation of inventar (first conjugation)
infinitive inventar
auxiliary verb aver gerund inventando
past participle inventà
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative mi ti eło / eła noialtri / noialtre voialtri / voialtre łuri / łore
present invento (te) inventi (el/ła) inventa inventémo, inventòn inventé (i/łe) inventa
imperfect inventava (te) inventavi (el/ła) inventava inventàvimo inventavi (i/łe) inventava
future inventarò (te) inventarè (el/ła) inventarà inventarémo inventarè (i/łe) inventarà
conditional inventarìa (te) inventarisi (el/ła) inventarìa inventarìsimo inventarisi (i/łe) inventarìa
subjunctive che mi che ti che eło / eła che noialtri / noialtre che voialtri / voialtre che łuri / łore
present invente, inventa (te) inventi (el/ła) invente, (el/ła) inventa inventémo, inventone inventé (i/łe) invente, (i/łe) inventa
imperfect inventase (te) inventasi (el/ła) inventase inventàsimo inventasi (i/łe) inventase
imperative — ti eło / eła noialtri / noialtre voialtri / voialtre łuri / łore
